mapper.sql: EMP_NO, ID, EMP_NAME, PASSWORD, PHONE, ROLE_ID, JOB, MGR, SEX, BIRTH, SAL, ADDR, DEPNO, DONE_TIME, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, REMARK
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from bky_emp
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into bky_emp (EMP_NO, ID, EMP_NAME, PASSWORD, PHONE, ROLE_ID, JOB, MGR, SEX, BIRTH, SAL, ADDR, DEPNO, DONE_TIME, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, REMARK) values (#{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doneTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update bky_emp
EMP_NO = #{record.empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EMP_NAME = #{record.empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_ID = #{record.roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
JOB = #{record.job,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MGR = #{record.mgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{record.sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BIRTH = #{record.birth,jdbcType=DATE},
SAL = #{record.sal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDR = #{record.addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPNO = #{record.depno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DONE_TIME = #{record.doneTime,jdbcType=DATE},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update bky_emp set EMP_NO = #{record.empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EMP_NAME = #{record.empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_ID = #{record.roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JOB = #{record.job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MGR = #{record.mgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{record.sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BIRTH = #{record.birth,jdbcType=DATE}, SAL = #{record.sal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDR = #{record.addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPNO = #{record.depno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DONE_TIME = #{record.doneTime,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bky_emp
ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EMP_NAME = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
JOB = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MGR = #{mgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BIRTH = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE},
SAL = #{sal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DEPNO = #{depno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where EMP_NO = #{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bky_emp set ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EMP_NAME = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JOB = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MGR = #{mgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BIRTH = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, SAL = #{sal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDR = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPNO = #{depno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DONE_TIME = #{doneTime,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EMP_NO = #{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
